She would like to buy basic medicines with her loan money.  Olga works with her children and she re-invests all the money she makes into buying more medicines.  She has suppliers and she must pay the bills that they leave with her.

Olga requires this loan to invest in buying medicines to stock her pharmacy.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to invest in buying medicines to stock her pharmacy

loans.name: Nelson Edgardo

texts.es:
Nelson M. quiere agradecer a los financiadores de Kiva y dice: “gracias Kiva por el apoyo a mi taller, porque se logró dar un paso adelante en el proyecto de la prendería” . Nelson recibirá su segundo credikiva y está muy satisfecho porque con él comprará materiales para elaborar nuevas joyas y accesorios  especialmente en oro y plata y también reparará su mesón de trabajo que se encuentra algo deteriorado. Con su anterior financiamiento compró una máquina de galvanotecnia para baños en oro y el motortul para pulir las prendas. Si usted quiere ampliar la historia de Nelson ingrese al siguiente enlace:
http://kiva.org/lend/180041
texts.en:
Nelson M. would like to thank Kiva lenders.  He says "Thank you Kiva for the support that you have given my workshop.  It has enabled me to take a step forward in my jewelry business".

Nelson is receiving his second Kiva loan and he is very satisfied because he will use it to buy materials for making new jewelry and accessories, especially in gold and silver.  He will also mend his work counter which is in a fairly bad state of repair.  He used his previous loan to buy an electroplating machine for making gold plating and a 'mototool' for polishing pieces of jewelry.  If you would like to know more about Nelson's story, click on the following link: http://kiva.org/lend/180041.

loans.use: to buy materials for making new jewelry and accessories, especially in gold and silver

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El Sr. Juan  tiene como actividad venta de frutas de acuerdo a la temporada (manzanas, damascos, peras, ciruelas), actualmente esta vendiendo uvas de Tarija, actividad que esta muy bien administrada. El vende sus frutas en la zona comercial y populosa de  Villa Fátima en la cual realiza su recorrido diariamente, en una de las calles más concurridas la cual se caracteriza por tener muchas oficinas de transporte y parada de ómnibus con destino a los yungas. Su familia esta compuesta por su esposa quien también trabaja de la misma manera tiene  tres hijos en edad escolar. El Sr. Juan es una persona responsable, agradecida y emprendedora el objetivo del crédito solicitado es el de proveerse de fruta de temporada, de esta manera lograra  salir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sr. Juan has a business selling seasonal fruits (apples, apricots pears, plums etc.).  He is currently selling Tarijan grapes, a business that is very well managed.  He sells the fruit in the populous commercial district of Villa Fátima.  He travels there daily to sell his produce on one of the busiest streets; it has a lot of transport offices and a bus stop that goes to Los Yungas (the warm valleys of Bolivia).  His family is made up of himself, his wife, who is in the same line of work as Sr. Juan, and three school-aged children.  Sr. Juan is a responsable, grateful and enterprising person.  The purpose of the loan he has requested is to stock up on seasonal fruit to sell so that he can get ahead and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and to increase his working capital.

loans.name: Juan Manuel Fernando Mark

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba, departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Juan; El socio tiene 44 años de edad, el socio  es Casado; el socio tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 11 años de edad; el socio es guía de Turismo; el socio es una persona muy responsable y disciplinado, actualmente el socio continúa trabajando en Turismo y ahora que comienza la temporada alta el socio se está organizando y desea comprarse nuevos zapatos para sus caminatas, comprar una casaca, también renovar su equipo de viaje personal. El socio desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de su equipo de viaje personal para así continuar trabajando en su gran pasión  que es el turismo. El socio invertirá el préstamo en la compra de su equipo de viaje.

El socio se encuentra satisfecho con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Juan is a member of the "AMAUTA" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Juan is 44 years old, married, and has two children aged 14 and 11.  He is a tourist guide and a very responsible and disciplined person. He is currently  working in the field of tourism and now that the peak tourist season is beginning, he is getting organized.  He would like to buy new shoes for his hiking excursions, a jacket and he would also like to renew his personal travel gear. 

Juan would like to invest this loan in buying personal travel gear so that he can continue working in his true passion which is tourism.  He will invest his loan in buying travel gear.  Juan is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy travel gear

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Idalia de 32 años de edad, reside en Usulután, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella se dedica a una tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, el negocio nació hace 4 años y lo atiende de lunes a sábado.
Actualmente ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, con el propósito de mantener siempre su inventario abarrotado de buenos productos, este préstamo le ayudara para mantener a los clientes contentos con el buen servicio.
El sueño de Idalia es poseer un negocio amplio, en un local más grande y bien abastecido de aquellos productos que necesitan los clientes en sus hogares.
texts.en:
Idalia, 32, lives in Usulután with her husband and son.  She has a store where she stocks basic need items.  The business was born four years ago and it’s open from Monday through Saturday.

She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise to always have her store well stocked with good products.  This loan will help her keep her customers happy with good service.

Idalia’s dream is to own a spacious business in a larger locale that is well stocked with the products her customers need for their homes.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 3 showcases and beauty products.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir en la Republica de Argentina, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de una maquina industrial recta y el saldo comprar materia prima como ser telas, hilos, etc., para empezar a trabajar en Bolivia. Esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir los gastos de su familia. Vive en casa propia en Argentina, parte del tiempo y también tiene una casa propia en la zona Villa Los Andes de la ciudad de El Alto.  Es viuda y tiene tres hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Señora Elizabeth earns her living making garments in the Republic of Argentina.  She needs the loan to purchase an industrial upright sewing machine.  The balance of the loan will be used to purchase raw materials like fabrics, thread etc. so that she can start working in Bolivia. This business is the only source of income that she has to cover her family's expenses.  She lives in her own home in Argentina part of the time, and she also has her own home in the Villa Los Andes nieghborhood in the city of El Alto in Bolivia.  She is a widow and has three children.  This is the first time she has obtained a loan from IMPRO.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial upright sewing machine.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is a 38-year-old married man with four children. He owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. Johnson has been buying and selling matooke (green plantains) for five years. He started out by selling four bananas on one bicycle and now sells 200 bananas. His hardships include competition and lack of capital. In the future, Johnson wants to export the bananas. Johnson needs this loan to buy bananas to sell.

loans.use: to buy bananas

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es: Isidora tiene 45 años. Es una mujer emprendedora siempre está pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan.  Su actividad económica es la venta de bolsitas, gaseosas, bolis, bolsitas de leche entre otros. Isidora se dedica a este negocio desde hace más de 2 años la ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda, la mayoría de sus clientes siempre se encuentran satisfechos, por los buenos productos que ofrece. A pesar de ser una mujer que vive en condiciones humildes sabe ganarse el pan de cada día todos los días con su negocio, es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de bolsas, azúcar, frutas, gaseosas y jugos.
texts.en: Isidora, 45, is an enterprising woman who is always devoted to the needs of her customers. Her business is selling handbags, soft drinks, pens, milk, etc. Isidora has been in business for over two years and her business is located in her home. The majority of her customers are always satisfied by the high-quality products she offers. Despite being a woman from humble means, she knows how to earn money each day with her business. That is why is asking for a loan to buy handbags, sugar, fruits, soft drinks, and juices.

loans.use: to buy handbags, sugar, fruits, soft drinks, and juices

loans.name: Federico

texts.es: El señor Federico es chofer y trabaja con su movilidad en servicio de transporte de pasajeros. Está afiliado al sindicato de transportes Eduardo Avaroa; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de un motor nuevo para su vehiculo, ya que es la fuente de ingreso para mantener  a su familia. Vive en alquiler ubicado en la zona de Villa Tejada Rectangular de la ciudad de El Alto; es casado y tiene dos hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se el otorgaron, pues es cliente nuestro desde el año 2008.
texts.en: Señor Federico is a driver and uses his vehicle to transport passengers. He is a member of the Eduardo Avaroa transportation union. He needs the loan to buy a new motor for his vehicle, since it is his source of income for maintaining his family. He lives in a rented dwelling in the Villa Tejada Rectangular zome of the city of El Alto. He is married and has two children. This loan client is very satisfied with the loans that have been granted to him; he has been a client since the year 2008.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his vehicle for passenger transport

loans.name: Ana Maricela

texts.es:
Ana de 19 años de edad, reside en Puerto el Triunfo departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de ropa, golosinas y merienda, su familia la conforman su madre y hermanos, es soltera, tiene 4 años de dedicarse al negocio, ya que comenzó muy joven a ayudarle a su madre con el trabajo y a compartir los gastos del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en el inventario de ropa nueva, golosinas, arreglos y cosméticos, este préstamo le permitirá variar el negocio, ofrecer diferentes productos, lo que pretende es tener un negocio fuerte, rentable y capaz de atender la demanda de los clientes.
El objetivo de Ana es crecer con el comercio, mantenerse con productos de calidad y que sus ventas mejoren para ayudar con una mayor cantidad a su hogar.
texts.en:
Ana is 19 years old and she lives in Puerto El Triunfo in the department of Usulutan. She sells clothing, sweets, and light meals. Her family is made up of her mother and siblings. She is single and she has 4 years in the business. She started when she was very young in order to help her mother with the work and to share the household expenses.

She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of inventory, including clothing, sweets, flower arrangements, and cosmetics. This loan will help her add variety to the business and to offer different products.  Her goal is to have a strong business that is successful and capable of meeting client demand.

Ana's objective is to develop her business and to keep have quality products so that her sales will improve. She will therefore be able to contribute in a larger capacity to the home.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of new clothing, sweets, flower arrangements, and cosmetics

loans.name: Sonia Nancy

texts.es: La señora Sonia tiene la actividad de venta de hamburguesas  madre de una sola hija trabajadora ya que  lucha en la vida por darle una buena educación, la actividad que tiene esta en crecimiento  gracias a los créditos otorgados en la institución, sacrificada pero rentable, inicio su negocio hace mucho tiempo atrás de manera muy humilde obteniendo buenos resultados ya que las hamburguesas que realiza son muy agradables para su clientela, debido  a esta razón es que se animo a volver a solicitar otro crédito para comprar un refrigerador de tapa de vidrio donde pueda poner los refrescos para una mejor vista y gusto de los clientes, siendo este un emprendimiento de una mujer es bastante valorado por el esfuerzo que realiza durante todos los días  a partir de las 16:00 pm hasta las 24:00 pm, y esta es la rutina de la señora todos los días de la semana, para que su niña y ella misma puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Señora Sonia's business is selling hamburgers. She is the mother of a single daughter and is hard-working, struggling in life to give her daughter a good education. Her business is growing thanks to the loans granted by this institution. It requires sacrifice but is profitable. She began her business a long time ago in a very simple way, but she obtained good results, since the hamburgers that she produced were very agreeable to her customers. For this reasons, she was very encouraged to come back to apply for another loan to buy a refrigerator with a glass top where she can put beverages for better viewing and for the pleasure of her customers. As a woman's business undertaking, it is made worthwhile by the effort that she puts into it every day from 4 pm until midnight. This is her routine every day of the week, so that she and her daughter can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator with a glass top

loans.name: John

texts.es: El señor John tiene su vehiculo con el cual trabaja en transporte público; el crédito lo necesita para comprar repuestos  para la caja y el sistema de frenos, esto le ayudara a que trabaje con mayor seguridad y evitar accidentes de tránsitos, pues esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantener  a su familia. Es divorciado, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de las Lomas de la ciudad de La Paz. El señor esta satisfecho con los créditos que le otorgamos ya que mejora la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en: John works in public transportation and has his own vehicle. He needs this loan to buy spare parts for the gearbox and brakes, which will help him to work more safely and avoid traffic accidents. This work is his source of income for supporting his family. He is divorced, has four children and lives in his own home located in the Las Lomas district of La Paz. He is happy with the loans he has received because they improve the quality of life of all of his family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his gearbox and brakes

loans.name: Ingrid

texts.es: Ingrid tiene 32 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos pequeños en una casa heredada de sus padres. Desde su niñez ha estado dedicada a las tareas del campo, sus padres y su esposo la apoyan en esta tarea, es así que ahora  también siembra papa, maíz y verduras como espinacas, productos que son vendidos en la ciudad, asimismo almacena una parte para su consumo propio. Como es un trabajo arduo y lento, por lo que tiene que esperar un tiempo considerable hasta que pueda cosechar, mientras tanto aprovecha el tiempo comercializando prendas de vestir a sus clientes fijos que tiene,  que generalmente son personas que ya conoce y que son muy responsables en sus pagos. Afirma que le agrada realizar estos trabajos porque tiene disponible los alimentos para su propio consumo, además que se genera  ganancias futuras de la venta de los productos cosechados, por tanto seguirá con esa actividad por mucho mas tiempo. Es la tercera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP y considera que su paso por el banco comunal fue una experiencia muy exitosa que la ayudó a adquirir el habito del ahorro y la responsabilidad de controlar bien sus cuentas. En esta ocasión el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de semillas de papa y sacos de abono.
texts.en: Ingrid is 32 years old. She lives with her husband and their two little children in a house inherited from her parents. Since her childhood, she has worked in the fields. Her parents and her husband support her in this work. Thus she has now also planted potatoes, corn, and greens such as spinach, products that are sold in the city. In the same way, she stores part of her crops for their own consumption. As it is an arduous and slow work, in which she has to wait a considerable time until she can harvest, she meanwhile takes advantage of this time to sell articles of clothing to her regular customers, who are generally people whom she already knows and are very responsible in their payments. She confirms that she likes to do these jobs because she has at hand the foods for their own consumption, in addition to the future earnings from the sale of the products she harvests. Therefore, she will continue with this activity for a long time. This will be the third time that she has had a loan with MFP, and she feels that going through the communal bank was a very successful experience that helped her acquire the habit of saving and the responsibility of controlling her bills well. At this time, she will use the loan she is applying for to invest in the purchase of seed potatoes and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes and sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pineapples and to pay labor

loans.name: Carla Ivonne

texts.es: La Señora Carla es una cliente que antes ya trabajo con nosotros en el Banco rayito de sol, la Sra.  Carla vive en la casa de sus suegros desde hace cuatro años trabaja con su esposo Ismael ya que el costura las faldas que  vende ella tiene un puesto el la  zona de la Uyustus además viaja al desaguadero a traer mercadería ellos tienen un pequeño hijo de una añito de edad Doña Carla y su esposo Ismael estudian por las noches tienen la intención de a un corto tiempo instalar un taller de costura y comenzar con su propia empresa el crédito que están solicitando es para la construcción de un cuarto en la casa de sus papas y así poder brindar mas comodidad a su familia, es una joven muy trabajadora que esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Carla is a client who used to work with us as part of the 'Rayito de Sol' bank.  She lives in her in-laws' house.  For four years she has been working with her husband Ismael.  He sews skirts and she sells them from a sales location in Uyustus.  She also travels to Desaguadero to bring back merchandise.  Carla and her husband have a little boy who is 1 year old.  They also study at night.  They intend, within a short period of time, to set up a sewing workshop and start their own company.  They are requesting this loan to build a room in his parents' home so that their family can be more comfortable.  Carla is a very hard-working young woman who is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: to buy building supplies so that she can finish off a room in her home

loans.name: Julio Antonio

texts.es:
Don Julio de 47 años de edad, vive con su esposa y un hijo, residen en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, él es agricultor dedicado a la siembra de maíz, pipián, pepinos y ejotes, tiene 15 años de estar dedicado a la agricultura y aprendió el oficio de su padre.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de puertas para su vivienda, ya que está terminando de construirla y no alcanza a terminar con las puertas. Este préstamo será de mucha ayuda ya que hará posible la finalización de la vivienda, teniéndola más segura para vivir con su familia.
Las aspiraciones es ver totalmente construida la vivienda, seguir cultivando la tierra y a través de su trabajo cada día ofrecer una mejor condición económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Julio is 47 years old and he lives with his wife and son. They live in Jiquilisco in the department of Usulutan. He is a dedicated agriculturist who plants corn, gourds, cucumbers, and green beans. He has dedicated the past 15 years to agriculture and he learned the business from his father.

He requests a loan to purchase doors for his house. He is finishing to build it and he doesn't have enough funds to purchase the doors. This loan will be a great help because he will be able to complete the house, making it more safe to live for his family. 

His dream is to see his house completed, to keep cultivating his land, and through his day to day work to support his family with improved finances.

loans.use: to purchase doors for his house

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es: La señora Carmen Rosa se dedica al comercio de ventas de herramientas de trabajo, como martillos, entornilladores, palas, picos, clavos, etc.; el crédito lo necesita para aumentar el capital de trabajo y comprar más mercadería. Vive  en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Rió Seco de la ciudad de El Alto; es casada y  tiene dos hijos. Es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2009.
texts.en: Carmen Rosa's business is selling work tools such as hammers, screwdrivers, shovels, picks, nails, etc.  She needs this loan to increase her working capital and buy more merchandise.  She lives in her parents' home which is located in Río Seco neighborhood, in the city of El Alto.  Carmen Rosa is married and has two children.  She has been a client of IMPRO since 2009.

loans.use: to buy work tools to sell retail

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Luz Aidee

texts.es:
la señora Luz Aidee S. es una mujer luchadora que se dedica a la venta de tortillas y tambien hace trabajos como modista, distribuye sus tortillas en la colonia en donde vive, todos los dias se levanta muy temprano 
para empezar su produccion y asi satifacer la demanda de todos sus clientes.
el trabajo de modista lo realiza por las tardes y noches.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de las tortillas.
su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Luz Aidee S. is a defiant woman whose occupation is the sale of tortillas and she also creates fashion clothing. She distributes her tortillas in the colony where she lives. She starts her days very early in order to start producing and to satisfy the demands of all of her clients.

She carries out her seamstress business in the afternoons and in the evenings.

The loan will be used to purchase ingredients to make tortillas. Her goal is to make her business grow and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, lime, and water

loans.name: Percy

texts.es: Percy tiene 27 años, vive en casa de sus padres, en compañía de su madre y sus hermanos. Desde muy niño ha aprendido las tareas agrícolas, sus orígenes rurales le ha dotado de habilidades para dedicarse a la siembra y cosecha de diversos productos de su zona, como: papa, maíz, arveja, trigo, habas, entre otros. Pero desde hace 2 años decidió dedicarse a esta actividad de manera independiente, ante la dedicación constante y el arduo cuidado que le otorgó a sus cultivos, su primera cosecha fue exitosa, por lo que  le da ánimos de continuar adelante y seguir dedicándose a la agricultura. Además de las ganancias que percibe de la venta de sus cosechas, también se apoya económicamente del trabajo que ofrece como técnico dental en la elaboración de prótesis dental, resultándole muy rentable, lo cual hace que su economía mejore. Es su séptimo crédito con MFP, es una de las personas que  tiene un buen concepto de tener un crédito de manera grupal en su banco comunal porque ha tenido una experiencia positiva donde cada uno de sus  integrantes han demostrado puntualidad en sus pagos y la solidaridad compartida. En esta ocasión el crédito solicitado, esta destinado en la compra de sacos de abono para poder sembrar maíz.
texts.en: Percy is 27 years old and he lives in his parents' house in the company of her mother and his siblings. Since he was a very young boy he has learned about agriculture. His origins were in a rural environment and it has granted him the ability to dedicate himself to planting and harvesting a variety of products in his region, such as: potatoes, corn, peas, wheat, fava beans and others. But two years ago he decided to make himself independent in his business. Thanks to his constant dedication and the arduous work he invested in his plantations his first harvest was a great success. This encouraged him to continue and to stay in the field of agriculture.  The income that he earns from the sale of his harvests is supplemented with the work he carries out as a dental technician making dentures, a venture that is very profitable. This is his seventh loan with MFP and he is one of the individuals who have a good grasp on having a group loan through the communal bank. He has had positive experiences given that each one of the members has made the payments on time and the team effort is shared. He requests a loan to purchase sacks of fertilizer in order to plant corn.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to plant corn

loans.name: Nuria

texts.en: Nuria is a thirty-two-year-old single mother of four children and  she owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling cosmetics for two years starting with a capital of 500,000 shillings and she now has 2,500,000 shillings. Her hardship is low customer turn-out during the rainy season and her vision is to set up at least three outlets in town. Nuria needs the money for buying cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Loice

texts.en: Loice is a thirty-six-year-old married woman with three children and  she rents a house in Kasese, Uganda. She has been in the textile business for three years starting with 500,000 shillings working capital and expanding to 1,500,000 shillings. Her hardship is rain which disrupts customer turn-out and her desire is to own a boutique. Lioce needs the loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Gloria Elcidia

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, de 50 años de edad, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, es comerciante de verduras, frutas y mariscos, vive con su familia, su esposo e hijos, tiene 27 años de dedicarse al negocio el cual aprendió de sus padres.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería (frutas, verduras), esta inversión la quiere hacer para mantenerse fuerte y atender la demanda, ayudando a mejorar su inventario, aumentar sus ventas y a generar mayores ingresos.
La aspiración de doña Gloria es tener un negocio amplio, con suficientes productos para la venta, cuenta con mucho carisma para atender a los clientes, espera que este préstamo sea la prosperidad para el negocio.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria, age 50, resides in Jiquilisco in the Department of Usulután. She is a merchant who sells vegetables, fruits, and seafood. Gloria lives with her family, which consists of her husband and children. She has been in this business for 27 years and learned the trade from her parents.

Gloria is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (fruits and vegetables). This investment will keep her business strong, enable her to keep up with demand, help improve her inventory, increase her sales, and result in better income.

Doña Gloria has aspirations to expand her business by having enough products to sell. She attends to her customers with great care and hopes that this loan will help her prosper in her business.

loans.use: To purchase fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “AMAUTA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Lucila;  La socia tiene 72 años de edad; La socia es soltera;  La socia  es una mujer alegre, trabajadora y llena de vida, la socia vive junto a su hermana Carmen; la socia es docente cesada, ella se ha jubilado de la docencia y en la actualidad tiene un negocio con su hermana de compra y vende ropa para niños, la socia  requiere el crédito para comprar ropa para niños. 

La socia se encuentra satisfecha con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Amauta". It is located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba of the department of Cusco.

Her name is Lucila. She is 72 years old and she is single. She is a very happy woman, hardworking and full of life. She lives together with her sister, Carmen. She is a retired teacher. She retired from teaching and she now has a business with her sister selling children’s clothing. She requires a loan to purchase clothing for kids.

She is satisfied with the loan that was granted to her and she is committed to making the payments at the established intervals.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a thirty-eight-year-old married man with four children living in his own house in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in produce for the last five years starting with 400,000 shillings and he now has 4,000,000 shillings as capital. His hardship is price fluctuation and  his vision is to become a supplier of the whole region. John needs the loan to establish a store for his produce.

loans.use: to establish a store for his agricultural produce

loans.name: Pablo Emilio

texts.es: Pablo Emilio de 39 años, casado, es originario del departamento de Carazo, de oficio transportista lleva 3 años en este negocio. Inicio cuando tenía 37 años en ese entonces el no tenia los suficientes ingresos para proporcionarle a su familia lo necesario, hoy en día tiene su propio taxi, que lo alquila y las personas que lo manejan le entregan una cantidad la final del día. Actualmente Solicita el crédito es para comprar un juego de llantas y repuestos necesarios para su carro. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta tener otro vehículo, para obtener más ganancias.
texts.en: Pablo Emilio is 39 years old and he is originally from the department of Carazo. His occupation is public transport and he has been in the business for 3 years. When he started out he was 37 years old and back then he did not have sufficient income to provide his family with what they needed. Today he has his own taxi and he rents it so that other will drive it and he will earn a percentage at the end of the day. He requests a loan to purchase a set of tires and to carry out maintenance repairs to the car. Among his plans for the future is to have another vehicle in order to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase a set of tires and to carry out maintenance repairs

loans.name: Abia

texts.en: Abia is a thirty-seven-year-old single mother of four children and she owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. She has been dealing in produce for the last five years starting with 350,000 shillings working capital and she now has 2,500,000 shillings. Her hardship is price fluctuations and  her vision is to have a well-modernized store which can accommodate 1000 bags of agricultural produce. Abia needs money to buy beans and maize for resale.

loans.use: to hire a  vehicle to transport agricultural  produce.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en: Edson is a fifty-one-year-old married man with eight children and he owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in maize and cassava milling for three years starting with one machine and he now has two machines. His hardships include debtors, price fluctuations, and machine break-down, and his dream is to establish a milling factory and educate his children. Edson needs the loan to buy maize for resale.

loans.use: to buy maize for resale.

loans.name: Roy

texts.en: Roy is a forty-eight-year-old married woman with seven children and she owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling fresh foods for the last eighteen years. Her hardship is high transport costs and  her desire is to set up a food store and educate her children. Roy needs the loan to buy groundnuts and Irish potatoes for resale.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts and Irish potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis de 38 años de edad, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, se dedica a  la venta de refrescos y cosméticos variados, tiene 10 años de estar en el negocio, vive con su esposa y sus hijos.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos y abastecer los dos negocios, adquiriendo para hacer los refrescos y una variedad de cosméticos, su compromiso como vendedor es ofrecer a los clientes buenos productos, con bajos precios y actualizados en la moda, por lo que este préstamo será un gran apoyo para enriquecer su inventario.
Aspira ampliar sus negocios, aumentar sus ventas y mejorar  los ingresos económicos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 38 years old and resides in Jiquilisco in the Department of Usulután. He sells soft drinks and various cosmetics. Luis has been in business for ten years. He lives with his wife and children.

Luis is requesting a loan to purchase products, including soft drinks and a variety of cosmetics, so that he can restock his two businesses. His commitment as a merchant is to offer his customers good products at low prices and in a timely fashion. This loan will be a great help in enhancing his inventory.

He hopes to expand his businesses, increase his sales, and improve the financial earnings for his family.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics and soft drinks.

loans.name: Enterprising Women Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Emprendedoras” se formó con L. unión D. varias vecinas D. L. ciudad D. Mariano Roque Alonso.
L. Señora GracieL. A. es una D. L. integrantes del comité, elL. se dedica  a L.  venta D. comestibles (empanadas, sandwiches, milanesa, marinera, croqueta) para L. comunidad.
ElL. tiene una familia muy unida con 4 hijos y su marido, quien es empleado, un vendedor.
Actualmente se encuentra muy satisfecha con su actividad y L. capacitaciones que recibe el grupo, pero L. señora GracieL. solicita el crédito para comprar más productos (lácteos, panificados, huevos, carnes, etc.) para producir más comestibles para L. venta.
El grupo dice que sin L. ayuda D. Kiva y Fundación Paraguaya no sería imposible progresar, pero sería mucho más difícil hacerlo, ya que hay dificultades para prosperar sin entidades que ayuden económicamente.
texts.en:
The group named "Enterprising Women" was formed by a group of neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. 

GracieL. Aguero is one of the members of the group. She is a caterer by occupation, selling foods such as snacks, sandwiches, lunch meats, subs, and cookies in the community. She has a very close knit family and it is maD. up of her four children and her husband. He is employed as a vendor. She finds herself very satisfied with her business and with the support that she receives from her group. But GracieL. requests a loan to purchase more ingredients (milk products, breads, eggs, meats, etc) to be able to produce more food to sell. 

The group knows that without the support of Kiva and Fundacion Paraguaya (Kiva Field Partner) it would be very difficult to progress although not impossible. Obstacles get in the way of progress when there are no entities that will proviD. financial support.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her catering business

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es:
La señora Zulma V. V., tiene 26 años y tiene tres hijos en edades escolares, su esposo trabaja como albañil en diferentes obras en construcción en la ciudad, su vivienda y producción de leche está ubicada a 8 kilometros de la ciudad, está en una ladera de cerro.

La  Señora Zulma se dedica al cuidado  de su ganado vacuno día a día Zulma lleva a pastorear a su  ganado, en las mañanas de forma manual ordeña a su ganado, no los trabajos pecuarios que realiza son de forma manual, solo usan tachos plásticos.
 
Zulma nos cuenta que con el crédito comprará una vaca lechera para aumentar su producción y al contar con un mejor ingreso tratar de mejorar sus condiciones de vida que son precarias en cuanto a  servicios y vivienda.
texts.en:
Zulma V. V. is 26 years old and she has three school-aged children. Her husband is a construction worker at various construction projects around the city. Their house and their dairy farm are located 8 kilometers from the city and it is located at the foot of a hill. 

Zulma takes care of her cattle every day. Zulma shepherds her cattle and she milks them by hand in the mornings. She carries out her farm work by hand, using only plastic barrels.

Zulma tells us that with her loan she will purchase a dairy cow in order to increase production.  She will have a better income and she will improve her quality of life which is precarious with respect to services and their house.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Evidel Alexander

texts.es:
Evidel de 21 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive con sus padres y hermanos, es soltero, no tiene hijos, en su familia todos trabajan para colaborar con sus padres, él por su parte se dedica a la ganadería, comenzó a dedicarse a esta actividad con el apoyo de sus padres, no tiene un horario fijo de atención.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar ganado, ya que se le presenta la oportunidad de adquirir ganado por que él quiere realizar la compra.
El objetivo de Evidel es adquirir ganado cada vez que exista la oportunidad, para ir creciendo poco a poco y ayudar a sus padres para mejorar su condición económica.
texts.en:
Evidel is 21 years old and resides in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. He lives with his parents and siblings. Evidel is single and has no children. He and his family work together. Evidel raises cattle and started in this activity with the help of his parents. He cares for his animals, but he does not have a fixed schedule.

Evidel is currently requesting a loan to buy cattle. He has been presented with an opportunity to acquire cattle, so he wants to take advantage of it. His goal is to obtain cattle through this existing opportunity so that he grow slowly and help his parents improve their financial condition.

loans.use: To purchase cattle.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jenny Maria

texts.es:
la joven Jenny P. es una mujer emprendedora y muy dedicada a su negocio, el cual es la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pequeña pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, y este es un lugar estrategico, la afluencia de personas es grande. Jenny todos los dias abre su negocio a las 6 de mañana para 
satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes y lo cierra hasta las 9 de la noche.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi surtir su negocio.
su meta es crecer con su negocio y lograr en un futuro tener una buena casa y un buen negocio.
texts.en:
The young Jenny P. is an enterprising woman and she is very dedicated to her business. She sells every day products and she has a small convenience store located in her house. She is located in a strategic place which is highly populated. Jenny opens her business every day at 6 in the morning in order to satisfy the needs of her clients. She doesn't close until 9 at night. 

She will use her loan to purchase merchandise in order to stock her business. 

Her goal is to make her business grow and to have a very nice house and a good business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her grocery store

loans.name: Yesenia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yesenia de 21 años de edad, reside en Santa María, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo, una hija de 2 años y también su madre, todos trabajan, solamente su hija depende económicamente; se dedica a la preparación y venta de tamales, comenzó con la ayuda de su madre, trabaja de forma ambulante y no tiene un horario fijo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de elotes y leña, esto para preparar los tamales, con esta ayuda contara con lo necesario y fortalecerá el negocio, para seguir generando ingresos a su familia.
Las aspiraciones de Yesenia son crecer con el negocio, mejorar la clientela y vivir más solvente con los gastos e ingresos de la familia.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 21 years old. She lives in Santa María, in the Usulután department, with her husband, their 2-year-old daughter and her mother. The three adults have a job, only her daughter is economically dependent on them. Yesenia engages in preparing and selling tamales, an activity she started with her mother’s help. She is a street vendor and her working hours are flexible.
She is currently requesting a loan to buy maize and firewood to prepare tamales. This loan will help her acquire what she needs and it will strengthen her activity, thus enabling her to keep on earning money for her family.
Yesenia wishes for her activity to keep on growing, she wants to increase the number of her customers and to participate even more in solving the family’s debts and in generating an income for her family.

loans.use: To buy maize and firewood.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
la señora Maria S. es una mujer luchadora que se dedica a la elaboracion de mosaicos (artesanias) Maria entrega su producto a varios clientes los cuales se encargan de distribuirlo por varias tiendas y hoteles de la ciudad de cholluteca. sus clientes la prefieren por la calidad y el detalle con que trabaja sus mosaicos, ademas que mantiene precios muy buenos.
Maria trabaja duro para sacar adelante a su hijo.
su meta es hacer crecer su negocio para poder tener mayores ganancias, las cuales necesita para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Maria S. is a fighter who is dedicated to the production of tiles (crafts). Maria distributes her products to various clients who in turn distribute to various stores and hotels in the city of Choluteca. Her clients prefer her products for the quality and detail that she imparts on her tiles. She also has very good prices.  Maria works hard to provide for her son. 
Her goal is to make her business grow in order to increase her earnings. She needs her income to provide her son with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, lime, and coloring

loans.name: Mujeres Laboriosas Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Laboriosas” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso.
La Señora Lilian C. es una de las integrantes del comité, ella se dedica a la venta de carbón principalmente, y helados en sus tiempos libres.
Ella no tiene hijos y su marido se dedica a la panadería.
Ella desea poder obtener el crédito para comprar carbón en cantidad de mayorista, pues así le quedarán mayores ganancias a la hora de contabilizar los ingresos económicos luego de la reventa.
El comité se encuentra muy agradecido desde ya, pues sin la ayuda financiera de Kiva no podrían lograrlo.
texts.en:
The group named "Hardworking Women" was made up by a group of neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso. 

Lilian C. is one of the members of the group and she sells charcoal most of the time, and she sells ice-cream on her spare time.

She doesn't have any children and her husband is a baker. 

She would like to have a loan to purchase charcoal in wholesale quantities in order to improve her profits when the income is calculated after resale.

The group is very thankful because if it weren't for Kiva's financial support they would not be able to achieve their goals.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal in wholesale quantities

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Don Misael, tiene 55 años de edad, vive con su esposa y una cuñada, residen en Usulután; don Misael se dedica a la ganadería, este negocio lo inicio por el apoyo de amistades que son ganaderos, trabaja junto a su esposa, no tiene un horario fijo para realizar los quehaceres de la ganadería, cuenta con experiencia en la actividad.
Él quiere realizar una compra de ganado y no ha completado el monto de la compra, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita adquirir el ganado y aumentar así el numero de animales en el corral.
Las aspiraciones de don Misael es aumentar su capacidad de negociar, mejorar la condición de vida de su esposa.
texts.en:
Don Misael, age 55, lives with his wife and sister-in-law in Usulután. He raises livestock and started this business with the help of friends who are cattle ranchers. Misael and his wife work together, but they do not have a fixed schedule by which they perform the chores related to raising cattle. They have experience in this type of business.

Misael wants to buy cattle, but he does not have enough money to complete the purchase. For this reason, he is requesting a loan that will allow him to acquire cattle and increase the number of animals in his herd. His goals include increasing his capacity to negotiate and improving the living conditions for his wife.

loans.use: To purchase cattle.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.es:
Benjamín, de 30 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel,  vive junto a sus padres está estudiando en la universidad, al mismo tiempo se dedica a las labores agrícolas desde hace mucho tiempo, pues su padre también se dedica a esta actividad, trabajan todos los días de la semana de 6:00am a 2:00pm, la jornada depende de la temporada y de la necesidad de trabajar.
El solicita un préstamo para en el pago de alquiler de  la tierra que se va a utilizar para sembrar, además tiene unos gastos universitarios que también quiere cubrir con el préstamo. Este préstamo le ayudara a asegurarse del terreno y poder realizar la siembra de maíz.
Benjamín tiene como objetivo terminar sus estudios universitarios, por ello cada día se empeña en realizar su trabajo de la mejor manera, ya que a través de él cubre sus gastos.
texts.en:
Benjamín, age 30, lives with his parents in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. He is studying at the university, but he also has been farming for a long time since his father earns a living in this manner. Benjamín works every day of the week from 6am to 2pm. His schedule depends on the season and the work that needs to be done.

The loan he is requesting will be used to rent land for planting crops. In addition, part of this loan will cover some of his university expenses. This loan will enable him to secure the landed needed for growing corn.

Benjamín’s goal is to finish his university studies. Every day he is determined to do the best job he can so that he can cover his expenses.

loans.use: To rent a piece of farmland and pay for some of his university expenses.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Amparo Soledad

texts.es:
Amparo de 34 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene un pequeño cyber en su casa. Antes de tener un negocio estable ella tuvo una tienda pero como pedio a su bebe tuvo que dejar ese negocio. 

En la actualidad ella tiene un pequeño cyber en su casa, en donde trabaja dando el servicio de internet y impresiones. Trabaja con ayuda de su hijo desde muy temprano hasta el anochecer. Tiene muchas aspiraciones para su negocio por eso quiere continuar comprando con el préstamo computadoras. En el futuro quiere tener el negocio más grande.
texts.en:
Amparo is 34 years old and she is a hardworking woman who has a small internet cafe in her house. Before she had a stable business she had a store but when she became pregnant she had to abandon that business.

Currently she has a small internet cafe in her house from where she provides internet and printing services. She works with her son's help from very early in the morning until nightfall.

She has great aspirations for her business which is why she wants to purchase computers with her loan. In the future she wants to have a larger business.

loans.use: to purchase computers

loans.name: Rio De Oro Group

texts.es:
Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal Rio D. Oro, tiene 40 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos D. 20 y 10 años D. edad. Lucia se dedica al engorD. y crianza D. chanchos, hace más D. 5 años, elL. compra los chanchos en L. ferias, los engorda y luego los venD. a las carniceras. Una tía le incentivo para que comenzara con éste negocio y le va bien. El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en L. compra D. chanchos.
Lucía ingreso a Finca Perú, por L. invitación D. su cuñada, con éste es el tercer ciclo que está, le gusta porque le dan un capital para trabajar y pueD. ahorrar, aprenD. D. las capacitaciones que recibe D. su promotora. Su sueño es abrir una tienda D. abarrotes en su casa y que sus hijos tengan su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Lucía is a member of the 'Río D. Oro' (River of Gold) community bank.  She is 40 years old, married, and has 2 children aged 20 and 10.  Lucía's business is fattening and raising pigs.  She has been doing this for more than 5 years.  She buys her pigs at livestock markets, fattens them, and then sells them to butcher's shops.  It was one of her aunts who motivated her to start out in this business and it is doing well.  She will invest her loan in buying pigs.

Lucía was invited to join Finca Perú by her sister-in-law.  This is her third loan cycle.  She likes being a member because they give her working capital and she is able to save.  She learns from the training sessions that she receives from her advisor.  Lucía's dreams are to open a grocery store in her home and for her children to own their own businesses.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Dolis Esther

texts.es: Dolis C. es una mujer muy valiente, emprendedora y madre de tres hijos en las edades de 17 y 18 años, por los cuales cada día se levanta y trabaja fuertemente con tal de verlos con bienestar y cumpliendo cada uno su sueños. Su experiencia de negocios data desde hace 6 años, cuando empezó vendiendo ropa entre sus amigas y posteriormente tomando pedidos de calzado cosmético, perfumes y gran variedad de productos que le solicitan clientes rentables y referidos por estos. De esta manera Dolis realiza su negocio y otorga créditos y aunque tiene una alta competencia, en las líneas de productos que ofrece, siempre está en la búsqueda de buenos precios y en darle respuesta oportuna a sus clientes y esto es su gran desafío, porque con su pequeño capital invertido en este negocio, para responderles debe esperar la recuperación de su cartera. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará ropa, calzado, perfumes y variedades de artículos de temporada escolar, para mantener su rentabilidad de un 33% y lograr aumentar su capital de trabajo en función de apoyar la educación futura  de sus hijos con el aumento gradual en sus utilidades.
texts.en:
Dolis C. is a very courageous, enterprising mother of three children aged 17 and 18.  Every day she gets up and works hard for her children in order to take care of their well-being and ensure that they can fulfil every one of their dreams.  Dolis' business experience dates back 6 years which is when she started out selling clothes to her friends.  She then started taking orders for shoes, cosmetics, perfumes and a large variety of other products, from existing customers and people to whom she had been recommended.

This is how Dolis runs her business.  Although she faces stiff competition on the lines of products that she offers, she is always seeking out good prices and responding to her customers' needs in a timely manner.  Her big challenge is that the small amount of capital that she has is invested in her business so in order to meet her customers' demands she must wait until her money is freed up again.  This is why she is requesting a Kiva loan which will be her first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use it to buy clothes, footwear, perfumes and a variety of school supplies for the upcoming school year in order to keep her profitability at 33% and increase her working capital in order to support the future education of her children by gradually increasing her profits.

loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, perfumes and a variety of school supplies

loans.name: Jose Ramiro

texts.es:
José Ramiro, de 38 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, está viviendo con su esposa y tres hijos de 12, 14 y 18 años de edad, él es empleado y realiza labores agrícolas, su trabajo es como vigilante de la avícola campestre de la empresa de pollo campestre, también realiza la siembra de maíz y frijol, este oficio lo aprendió hace 22 años por medio de sus padres.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para el pago de alquiler de terreno, el lugar donde espera realizar la siembra de maíz y frijol, este proceso lo realiza todos los años, y recurre al alquiler de terreno porque él no dispone de un espacio para poder cultivar.
El préstamo le ayudara a que con anticipación tenga seguro el terreno para levar a cabo el trabajo, la aspiración de José Ramiro es poder hacer bien su trabajo para apoyar a sus hijos en los estudios y que en un futuro sean profesionales.
texts.en:
José Ramiro, age 38, resides in San Rafael Oriente in the Department of San Miguel. He lives with his wife and three children (ages 12, 14, and 18). José is employed and engages in farming. He works as a guard at a poultry farm that is owned by company that sells chicken. José also grows corn and beans. He learned this trade from his parents 22 years ago.

José Ramiro is requesting a loan to rent a piece of land in hopes of planting corn and beans. He completes this process every year and continues to rent land because he does not have the space to grow these crops.

This loan will help him secure land in advance so that he can carry on with his work. He aspires to do well in his work so that he can support his children with their studies, which will help them become successful professionals in the future.

loans.use: To rent farmland for growing beans and corn.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María Elena, es socia del Banco Comunal Alelí, tiene 19 años y un hijo.
Maria Elena se dedica a la venta de ropas y calzados para damas y niños. El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercaderías. María Elena viaja a Lima y trae ropas y calzados de Lima y los vende entre sus vecinas, le pagan a diario o semanal, ingreso a Finca Perú, por la invitación de su tía, con este es el tercer ciclo que está, le gusta porque le dan un capital para trabajar, puede ahorrar y le enseñan valores y le capacitan a como invertir su capital, a mejorar en su familia y matrimonio.
Su sueño es poder ahorrar para su casa y que su hijito tenga una buena educación.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is a member of the communal bank named Aleli. She is 19 years old and she has a son. 

Maria Elena sells ladies' and children's clothing and shoes. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of merchandise. Maria Elena travels to Lima and brings clothing and shoes from Lima to sell to her neighbors. Her customers pay her daily or weekly. She joined Finca Peru (Kiva Field Partner) following an invitation by her aunt. This is her third loan cycle. She appreciates it because she is given working capital and she is able to save. They teach values and how to invest their capital funds, as well as how to improve their family life and marriage.

Her dream is to save enough money for a house and that her little boy will have a good education.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing for the season

loans.name: Al-Harrkan Islamic Secondary School In Makeni Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers of the AL-Harrkan Islamic Secondary School in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of SLL 6,600,000 in order to meet their immediate financial needs. 

AL-Harrkan Islamic Secondary school was founded in 1979 by the Sierra Leone Muslim Youth Cultural Organisation/AL-Harrkan Mission to provide education to the children of Makeni and beyond. The school is staffed with 15 teachers and has an enrollment of 400 pupils. Irrespective of the many hurdles (such as the lack of sufficient buildings – classrooms, a library, a laboratory and inadequate learning and teaching materials), the school has managed to excel in public examinations and has been very competitive in extra-curricular activities like sport, quiz competitions, etc. 

Mr. Osman Calla K. (pictured on the right) is the man behind the school’s success. Mr. K. is the principle at the school and leader of the group. With 28 years of experience in the teaching profession, Mr. K. is able to inspire his staff into producing the desired result. Born in Makeni city, Mr. K. is married to a teacher and they have six children – two in secondary school, three in college and one working. Mr. K. has requested this loan in order to purchase a piece of land for the future construction of a house and to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: To purchase a piece of land and  pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: York Road Traders Group

texts.en:
Please meet members of the “York Road Traders” group from Waterloo, a small town in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, in order to apply for a loan of SLL 500,000 each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Aminata is the leader of this group. A native of Waterloo town, Aminata is married to a soldier and they have two children. Aminata has been a businesswoman for many years now and she sells palm-oil and cosmetics. With her share of this loan, she will buy bags of palm-oil and cosmetics in large quantity to add to her business.

(Also included in the left of the photo is loan officer Edna B. C. handing over the loan to the borrowers).

loans.use: to buy palm-oil and cosmetics

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita R. Martínez vive en el barrio Simón Bolívar, donde la música, el folclor y la educación de su gente, es lo más significativo  de las familias que trabajan principalmente en una actividad independiente, generando ingresos importantes para apoyar el sostenimiento del hogar. Desde este ambiente Margarita tiene un negocio donde comercializa con artículos variados, que traen de la ciudad de Medellín, especialmente ropa. Actividad que inició debido al carácter independiente de Margarita, el cual aplicó a su emprendimiento microempresarial generador  de ingresos, que finalmente destinó a su familia. Ella inició vendiendo de todo un poco: ropa, calzado, perfume, entre vecinos y amigos, posteriormente por recomendaciones logró ingresar al mercado de empleados de empresas, los cuales son sus principales clientes, algunos de ellos han surgido por recomendación de su esposo, quien trabaja en una empresa y la apoya en sus ideales. Ahora Margarita vende de todo lo que le solicitan, así ella toma el pedido y hace esfuerzos por ser muy oportuna, pues con esto compite en el mercado con mucha fuerza. Este es su financiamiento número 11 con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y es también su primer credikiva con el cual comprará ropa de Medellín,  a un buen precio y con ello obtendría un aumento en sus utilidades. Con los financiamientos anteriores ha logrado fortalecer su independencia y apoyar con sus ingresos a su familia, pues con su esposo están de acuerdo con el sueño de tener un almacén bien posicionado que continúe generando bienestar a todos.
texts.en: Margarita R. M. lives in the community of Simon Bolivar, location where music, folklore and education for the people is the most important thing for families. They primarily have independent businesses to generate income for the support of their home. In this environment Margarita has a small business from where she sells various articles that are brought from the city of Mendellin, especially clothing. The business was started given Margarita's independent nature, which she applied to her income generating activity. It was for the ultimate benefit of her family. She started out slowly, selling clothing, shoes, and perfumes to her neighbors and friends. Later, with the help of recommendations, she managed to join the market of company employees, who today are her main clients. Some of her clients have succeeded with her husband’s recommendation. He works in a company and he supports her in her ideas. Margarita now sells everything that has been requested. She takes an order and she makes a very opportune effort.  This makes her a very strong competitor in the market. This is her eleventh loan with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo (Kiva Field Partner) and it is her first with Kiva, with which she will invest in the purchase of clothing in Mendellin at a good price. She will see an increase in her earnings. With the previous loans she has managed to strengthen her independence and to support her family with her income. She and her husband share the same dream of having a well-located grocery store that will continue to support the well-being of them all.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Rosa Grace

texts.es:
Rosa de 28 años, es una mujer trabajadora que desde muy joven le gusto trabajar. Por eso en la actualidad vende artículos plásticos. Vende los artículos a sus conocidos y amigos a un precio muy económico. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su ventas por eso ella vende de todo tipo como jarras, bandejas, vasos etc. Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar con el préstamo artículos plásticos para seguir trabajando con un mayor número en sus ventas. En el futuro quiere incrementar su negocio y así darle un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 28 years old and she is a hardworking woman.  She has enjoyed working since she was very young. Currently she sells plastic items. She sells the items to her acquaintances and to friends at a very affordable price. 

She has many aspirations with her business which is why she sells all types of items, including pitchers, tubs, glasses, etc. In order to sustain her business she wants to purchase with her loan plastic articles and to keep having an increased level of sales. In the future she wants to increase her business in order to provide her children with a better future.

loans.use: to purchase plastic articles

loans.name: River Breezes Group

texts.es:
el grupo Brisas del Rio esta ubicado en el Barrio Arenas de la ciudad de Choluteca, lo integran tres mujeres, todas se conocen desde hace mucho tiempo y son muy buenas amigas, trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus familias.
A continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellas realizan:

doña Maria A. es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene 6 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad. elabora sus tortillas en su casa de habitacion.
Maria es madre de 4 hijos, los cuales los tiene estudiando, junto con su esposo trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, todos los dias se levanta a las 5 de la mañana para producir sus ricas tortillas.  sus tiempos libres lo dedica a visitar iglesia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la produccion de las tortillas. 

doña Felix M. es una mujer trabajadora y que se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas desde hace 7 años.
Felix es madre de 3 hijos, los cuales los tiene en la escuela de su comunidad, ademas cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que trabaja de albanil.
sus tiempos libres lo dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de las tortillas.

doña Emerita M. se dedica a la venta de baleadas en diferentes barrios de la ciudad de Choluteca, Emerita es madre de 2 hijos, los cuales estan pequeños de edad. 
Emerita cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que trabaja en una empresa de seguridad. 
sus hijos los tiene en el kinder.
en sus tiempos libres visita la iglesia.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para la fabricacion de las baleadas.

Ellas son mujeres luchadoras y con muchos deseos de salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The group named Brisas del Rio, meaning River Breezes, is located in the community of Arenas in the city of Choluteca. It is made up of three women who have known each other for a long time and they are very good friends. They work hard to provide for their families. 

In following paragraphs are the details of the different businesses they have: 

Mrs. Maria A. is an enterprising woman who sells tortillas. She has 6 years in the business. She makes her tortillas at home. Maria is the mother of 4 children, all of whom she has kept in school. Together with her husband she works hard to provide for her children. She starts every day at 5 in the morning to make delicious tortillas. In her spare time she visits her church. 

The loan will be used to purchase ingredients to make tortillas.

Mrs. Felix M. is a hardworking woman who has been making and selling tortillas for the past 7 years. 

Felix is the mother of 3 children, all of whom are in the community school.  She has her husband’s support and he works as a construction worker.

In her spare time she raises poultry and pigs.

The loan will be used to purchase ingredients to make tortillas.

Mrs. Emerita M. has been selling baleadas (traditional Honduran food) in various communities of the city of Choluteca. Emerita is the mother of 2 young children. 

Emerita has her husband's support and he works in a security company.  Her children are in kindergarten. In her spare time she visits her church. 

The loan will be used to purchase ingredients to make baleadas. 

They are defiant women who are eager to get ahead and to have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare foods

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: El solicitante inicio el negocio hace tres años cuando una amistad le propuso manejar su vehiculo desde ese día viene desempeñando esa labor es soltero vive en casa familiar no tiene hijos cuenta con buenas referencias  laborales y personales se caracteriza por ser una persona amable honesta y responsable solicita el crédito para darle mantenimiento a su unidad de transporte es por ello que se propone el crédito.
texts.en: He started his business three years ago when a friend suggested being a driver for his car.  Since that day he has this occupation. He is single and he lives in the family home. He does not have children. He has good business and personal references and he is known as a kind, honest, and responsible person. He requests a loan to carry out some maintenance repairs to his car.

loans.use: to carry out maintenace repairs to his car

loans.name: Better Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone is very pleased to present to you members of the “Better” group. They are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of SLL 800,000.00 each in order to invest in their respective businesses. 

Abibatu S. S. is the leader of this group. Abibatu was born in a small town call Mile Ninty-One in northern Sierra Leone. She is married and has five children. Abibatu sells market-food – beans, rice, palm-oil, groundnuts, etc. and has been doing this business for many years now. With her share of this loan, she will buy the above mentioned items in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, palm-oil, groundnuts, etc. in bulk

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 46 años, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa de unos familiares. Desde hace 3 años se dedica  las actividades agrícolas, y diariamente prepara sus terrenos para sembrar alfalfa y otros productos que le sirven de forraje para sus animales, ya que son indispensables para que produzca leche. Durante este tiempo de trabajo ha visto el resultado de su esfuerzo y constancia, ahora posee más vacas en su establo y espera en el futuro adquirir más animales, con el fin de intensificar su actividad.  Esta convencida  que con esfuerzo logrará mejores beneficios económicos, por ello se ha propuesto tener un establo ganadero. Es su crédito número 8 con MFP, todo este tiempo de experiencia le ha servido para mejorar su situación económica, además de conocer personas que ahora son sus mejores amigos, por tal motivo seguirá integrando su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de semillas de alfalfa, ya que sembrará en otras extensiones de terreno, para que sea el alimento de sus animales.
texts.en: Ana is 46 years old and she lives with her husband and their 2 children in a house belonging to a family member. For the past 3 years she has been dedicated to agricultural activities and every day she prepares her land to plant alfalfa and other products that serve as foraging for her livestock. They are indispensable for milk production. During this work season she has seen the fruit of her efforts and sustained work. She has more dairy cows in her stable and she hopes in the future to acquire even more livestock with the hopes improving her business. She is convinced that with effort she will improve her earnings, which is why she has set up a dairy farm. This is her eighth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and throughout all this time it has help her improve her financial situation. Additionally she was able to meet new people, who are now her friends, reason why she will continue to be part of her communal bank. The loan that she requests will be invested in the purchase of alfalfa seeds to plant in other plots of land and to produce feed for her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase alfalfa seeds

loans.name: Poor Nor Good Group

texts.en:
In the photo are members of the “Poor Nor Good” group. They are small scale business people based in Waterloo, a small town near Freetown. These small scale business people are requesting a loan of SLL 800,000 each from SMT/Kiva lenders in order to increase their business inventories. In this way, they will make more sales, better profit and consequently improves their living conditions. 

The leader of this group is Osman K.. Osman was born in Makeni, he is married to a businesswoman and the couple has four children. For five years now, Osman has been a businessman selling cameras, photo albums, film, etc. Osman will use his share of the loan to buy the above mentioned items in bulk to add to his business. This will help Osman generate more profit to pay school fees for his children and improve his standard of living.

(Also included in the left of the photo is loan officer Kadiatu Bah handing over the loan to the borrowers.)

loans.use: to buy cameras, photo albums, film, etc.

loans.name: Maria Eduarda

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria M. se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de Golosinas, su negocio esta  ubicado en el Instituto Polivalente “UNION DE ORIENTE” 
Doña Maria tiene mucha experiencia en este tipo de negocio, en dicho centro de estudio para este año debido al crecimiento estudiantil han aperturado una nueva caseta para la venta de golosinas y se la han dado a ella para que la trabaje, pero doña Maria no cuenta con el capital de trabajo para surtir la cafeteria.
Maria elabora las comidas para los maestros (desayunos y almuerzos) mismos que le cancelan cada vez que reciben el sueldo.
el credito lo utilizara para surtir su cafeteria y asi poder cubrir las exigencias de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria M. is a merchant and her primary business activity is the sale of snacks. Her business is located in the "Union de Oriente" educational institution. 

Maria has a great deal of experience in this type of business. There has been a growth in the student population in the educational center this year so a new snack bar has been opened and they have given it to her to manage. But Maria doesn't have the financial resources to stock the store. 

Maria prepares foods for the teachers (breakfasts and lunches) who pay their tab each time they receive their pay. 

The loan will be used to stock her snack bar and to be able to meet her clients' demands.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare foods

loans.name: Daysi Elizabeth

texts.es:
Daysi de 27 años, es una joven emprendedora que tiene un salón de belleza, donde hace cortes de cabello, peinados, tinturados etc. Trabaja desde las 08h30am hasta las 20h30pm en su salón de belleza. 

Desde muy joven ella trabajo haciendo cortes de cabello y peinados por eso decidió que su actividad principal de generar ingresos era tener un salón de belleza. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo productos de belleza, herramientas para su negocio. En el futuro quiere incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Daysi is 27 years old and she is a young enterprising woman who owns a beauty salon. She offers hair cuts, hair styling, dying, etc.  She works from 8:30am to 10:30pm in her beauty salon.

Since she was very young she has been providing hair cuts and hair styling services, which is why she decided to make this her primary income generating business. She has great aspirations for her business which is why she would like to purchase beauty products and styling tools with her loan. In the future she wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products

loans.name: Lisbeth

texts.es: Lisbeth de 26 años, nacida en el distrito de Quimbiri; convive con Rafael Quispe de 33 años de edad y tienen 03 hijos y cuentan con su propia casa ubicada en la localidad de Lobo Tahuantinsuyo caserío del distrito de Quimbiri. Lisbeth y su pareja Rafael son el pilar de sus hijos, ha Lisbeth desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a remover la tierra. ella es campesina y cuenta con 07 hectáreas de terreno cultivado con plantas de café y plantaciones de plátano; plantas oriundas de la zona selvática del Valle Río Apurimac. Viene removiendo la tierra hace 06 años en su propia parcela, pero en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los peones quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los frutos hasta los tendales. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de dichos frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en los distritos de Kimbiri y San Francisco; lugares donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad radica en no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas; es por ello que acude a los créditos que facilita la Institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café ya que cuenta con 01 hectárea de terreno no cultivado. Este su Primer crédito de Lisbeth con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles solicitados, realizará el pago a los jornaleros quienes se encargaran en cosechar los granos de café.
texts.en:
Lisbeth is 26 years old and she is originally from the district of Quimbiri. She lives with her common-law partner Rafael Quispe who is 33 years old. They have 3 children and they have their own house located in the community of Lobo Tahuantisuyo, in the district of Quimbiri. Lisbeth and her partner are the support for their children. Lisbeth was taught by her parents at a very young age how to work the land.

Lisbeth is a farmer and she has 7 hectares of land to cultivate coffee plants and bananas. They are native plants in the jungle region of Valle Rio Apurimac. She has been working the land for the past 6 years and she has her own fields but during the harvest she hires two farm hands to harvest and transport the products to the distributors. What she most enjoys about her work is the harvest. She always feels that the months of heavy work bring have their reward with the quality of the harvest. The most difficult part of the work has to transport the products form her community all the way to the distribution centers located in Quimbiri and San Francisco. This is where she gets better prices for her products. Her difficulties lie in not being able to count on financial resources to cover the advance payment required by the laborers who help her with her harvest. This is the reason why she requests a loan from MFP (Kiva Field Partner). But her trop priority now is to plant more coffee on a hectare of land that is not cultivated. This is the first loan that Lisbeth has with MFP and she knows that if she pays it on time she will be able to access future loan with greater ease. With the 1500 nuevos soles she requests she will hire laborers to help her harvest coffee grains.

loans.use: to hire day workers to help with the coffee harvest

loans.name: Gumercinda

texts.es:
la sra. Gumercunda M. tiene 55 años de edad, vive en la aldea el Juancho en la ciudad de Nacaome.
Gumercinda se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, ahi vende todo lo realacionado con la canasta basica, se nota que a sabido administrar su negocio ya que se mira bien ordenado y limpio, cabe mencionar que esta es la unica fuente de ingresos que Gumercinda tiene.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria y asi surtir mas su negocio, el motivo de querer aumentar su inventario es que los carros repartidores en dicha zona solo pasan una vez por semana y a veces se queda sin producto ocasionandole perdidas.
su meta es seguir creciendo con su negocio para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Gumercinda M. is 55 years old and she lives in the community of Juancho in the city of Nacaome.

Gumercinda sells goods of every day use. She has a grocery store in her house and there she sells everything that is needed for the home. It is evident that she has known how to properly manage her business because it is well organized and clean. It should also be mentioned that this business is the only source of income that Gumercinda counts on.

The loan will be used to purchase groceries and to supply her business in order to increase her inventory. The distribution trailers come to the region only once per week and sometimes she is left without products, translating into lost revenues.

Her goal is to keep her business growing in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase of plastic products for retail

loans.name: Viviana Del Carmen
